pageContext.claim: “This year, thanks to the efforts of everyone in this room, I am proud to report a new all-time record for the prosecution of violent crime. You also prosecuted 15,300 defendants for federal gun crimes, almost 20 percent more than the previous record.”
pageContext.analysis: These statistics were made possible because of former attorney general Jeff Sessions's decision to emphasize prosecution of more nonviolent crimes such as gun possession.
